lines.text: You wanna have a sunny Sunday here or y-y-you wanna bicker like two frogs left in the shade too long?
Hey! You think he knows what I look like?
He don't even have eyes yet.
Well maybe when he's in there floating like they say in my woman juices he can see in the dark without eyes like a cat can.
You are making my tan fade right in front of my very eyes!
The point I am trying to make here is you don't listen to me no more.
I listen when you don't say something stupid.
I read. I read books. I read magazines. I read... train schedules.
